snippet: The Big City Book Club’s hot-summer reading selection is Richard Price’s best-selling 2008 novel, “Lush Life.” Join us for the live discussion of the book on Tuesday, July 15, at 6:30 p.m.
lead_paragraph: The Big City Book Club’s hot-summer reading selection is Richard Price’s best-selling 2008 novel, “Lush Life.” Join us for the live discussion of the book on Tuesday, July 15, at 6:30 p.m.
